Folkestone Hythe & Romney Marsh Branch are delighted to announce details of their Summer Conference and Gala Dinner on Saturday June 14th, 2025
The afternoon conference will begin at 2pm. Core themes will be 'Family, Community, Country' and 'Britain is broken but we can fix it.' Come and meet your local members and branch officers, listen to speeches from Senior Reform UK representatives and broadcasters, ask questions and participate in policy discussions. Conference from the Westenhanger Castle Marquee. Complimentary Tea and Coffee is available throughout the event. From 2pm - 5pm. Tickets £15 per person (afternoon Session only)
Gala Fundraising Dinner: Come and join our guests, sponsors, committee and local members for a stand-out event in stunning surroundings. Enjoy a fantastic 3 course meal with live entertainment, take part in our auction for some stunning Prizes and our golden raffle. Arrive at 7.00pm. Dinner is served at 7.30pm with entertainment and dancing until 11.00pm Tickets £60 per person (if Reform UK Members) £70 per person non Members.
